description: Dismantling, removal, storage and partial relocation of wrought iron latticework balustrade located over platforms 3 and 4 and removal of associated cast iron column on platform 3 of Farringdon London Underground Station.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

N222-NRT-LET-CN-000139, N222-63110-CJV-WPP-CV-000332/00, N222-WSR-DRG-PL-000016/P02, 1 Photo Sheet, N222-WSR-DRG-AR-101001/C03; 101010/C06; 101231/C02; 101232/C02; 102229/C02; 102233/C02; 102741/C01; 102742/C02; 102743/C01; 102744/C02; 103168/C01; 103402/C02; 103403/C02; 103741/C02; 103742/C01; 104957/C01, N222-WSR-DRG-ST-109002/C02; 101220/C02, N222-NRT-DRG-AR-000012/P01; 000013/P01, N222-NRT-DRG-CV-001842/P04, 001843/P04, Slide 2; 5; 6; 7; 8; 10 (LBI REG: 23301).

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
